Text.Page: At Krumu's invitation, you went to Pond Faire.

Pond Faire has caused some very abnormal behavior in the tuwangis here!

I was sent to be an impartial observer, but perhaps you can embed yourself and learn more of the rituals they are performing.

My colleagues at the Mysterium would be very interested in an up-close study of this ritualized behavior. Sounds intriguing.

Pond Faire has caused some very abnormal behavior in the tuwangis here!

I was sent to be an impartial observer here, but perhaps you can do what I can'tâ€”embed yourself and learn more of the rituals they are performing.

It's all very interesting if you're into cultural anthropology...or if you just like a great big party.Tell me where to go.
